item.description:
Come and join us for some networking and fun! Don't forget to bring your favorite dessert and plenty of business cards!!

To Bring:

drinks (soda, water, juice...)
desserts
snacks
plastic plates, cutlery, and cups
napkins

Please email me with what you want to bring and I will update this page based on your responses. If you are not able to bring something you can bring a donation of $5 instead, just let me know!

group.name: The Boston Green Business Networking Group

item.name: Holiday Networking Party
